title: Help and Support Reporting Players
body: I need help Reporting some bad eggs on league of legends and if you want to know more about what they did then come to me add hisokamorou55 on league of legends and I will tell ya why? cause I cant really put other players name on these things so yeah add me and I will tell you why they need to be reported these bad players

replies.body:
Did you report these players after the match? It's important to do so, as it flags the account for a review by the system. Check out our [**Reporting a Player FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player) for more information on how the system works.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
